name: Elemental Jelly Demo
description:
An action-adventure journey of a small slimy creature that has fast mobility. Focused on monster elimination with metroidvania elements.

Visit my website for more information on this project:  http://www.ronytamagames.com/elemental_jelly

Attention: This demo version is experimental, the goal of this version is to fix Bugs and get feedback from players regarding the game experience of this project.

If you find any errors please let me know on any of my social networks.

Thank you very much for playing this version of my project, your feedback helps me to improve.

  • State: Developing.
  • Genre: Metroidvania, Action, Adventure.
  • Language: Spanish , English.
  • Platforms: PC Windows.
  • Players: 1
  • Engine:Godot Engine 3.3.2
Minimum Requirements:
  • OS: Windows 7.
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo.
  • Memory: 2 GB de RAM ( Recommended 4 GB).
  • DirectX: Version 10.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space.
  • Additional Notes: To play the game you need the PC mouse.
